members.name: opened
members.description: Determines if the drawer is opened or not.

members.name: effect
members.description:
The animation effect for opening and closing the drawer.
Values include: (slide | reveal | push | scale)

members.name: side
members.description:
Allows you to control which side the drawer opens from.
Values include: (left | right | top | bottom)

members.name: overlay
members.description: Adds a overlay over the content section of the Drawer when opened

events.name: kemet-input-status
events.description:
Fires when there's a change in status.
This event includes an object that reports:
1) the status. 2) HTML5 validity object. 3) the component element.
Use the validity object to support custom validation messages.

members.name: opened
members.description: Determines whether or not the popover displays.

members.name: effect
members.description:
The opening and closing effect of the popover. Is optional.
Values include:
(fade | scale | slide | fall | flip horizontal | flip vertical | sign | super scaled)

members.name: position
members.description:
Determines the placement of the popover.
Values include: (top | right | bottom | left)

members.name: tooltip
members.description: Adds a built in tooltip to the popover.

members.name: customTooltip
members.description:
Adds a custom tooltip to the popover.
Use the custom-tooltip slot to specify the custom tooltip.

members.name: fireOn
members.description:
Controls how the trigger should activate the popover.
Values include: (click | hover)

members.name: clickOutside
members.description: Allows the popover to be closed by clicking outside of its content.

members.name: smart
members.description: Intelligently positions the popover.

events.name: kemet-popover-opened
events.description: Fires when the popover opens.

events.name: kemet-popover-closed
events.description: Fires when the popover closes.

members.name: element
members.description: A DOM element that establishes the context of scrolling.

members.name: target
members.description:
A DOM element that represents the destination of the scroll link.
If no target is specified it will default to the top of the page.

members.name: xOffset
members.description: Allows the horizontal scrolling to stop short of the given value.

members.name: yOffset
members.description: Allows the vertical scrolling to stop short of the given value.

attributes.name: element
attributes.description: A DOM element that establishes the context of scrolling.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description:
A DOM element that represents the destination of the scroll link.
If no target is specified it will default to the top of the page.

attributes.name: x-offset
attributes.description: Allows the horizontal scrolling to stop short of the given value.

attributes.name: y-offset
attributes.description: Allows the vertical scrolling to stop short of the given value.

members.name: effect
members.description: Determines where the transform point is activated. Values include: (sticky | resize)

members.name: transform
members.description: Whether or not the nav has shifted into a new state.

members.name: offset
members.description:
Allows for an arbitrary adjustment of the transform point in pixels.
Works with negative values.

attributes.name: effect
attributes.description: Determines where the transform point is activated. Values include: (sticky | resize)

attributes.name: transform

Allows for an arbitrary adjustment of the transform point in pixels.
Works with negative values.

members.name: slides
members.description: Information about each slide.

members.name: icon
members.description: A string representing which icon to use for pagination. Supports icons used in kemet-icon.

members.name: size
members.description: The size in pixels of the icons.

members.name: hideFocusedLinks
members.description: Will hide inactive pagination items if set to true.

members.name: useNumberPages
members.description: If set to true, the pages in the pagination iterator will appear as a set of numbers.

members.name: useLabelPages
members.description:
If set to true, the pages in the pagination iterator will appear as the label set on
the slide.

members.name: center
members.description: Determines whether to center the pagination items.

events.description: Fires when a set of slides are focused on.
